ja472:9.3: mahante → mahatte (s2, s3, mr), ṭhapetuṃ → ṭhāpetuṃ (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
ja472:12.1: Sabbova → sabbo ca (bj, pts1), ekato → ekanto (bj, pts1)
ja472:13.2: gambhīre ca suduttare → gambhīre ca duruttare (s2, s3) | gambhīre suduruttare (pts1, mr)
ja472:16.4: Evaṃ → sukhaṃ (pts1, mr), attanaṃ → attanā (s2, s3) | attani (pts1, mr) evaṃ ahampi puna sotthibhāvappattaṃ gilitabaḷisaṃ purisamiva attānaṃ passāmīti (aṭṭha. saṃvaṇṇanā)
ja472:19.5: Rājaputto ahaṃ āsiṃ → ahaṃ tadā rājaputto (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
